name: D Sands Condominium Motel

reviews.title: Adequate but not luxurious
reviews.text: We stayed at the D Sands on Friday, May 26 for one night in a family suite - room 311. The room was laid out with one bedroom with 2 beds and a living room/dining room kitchen with a murphy bed. The room had a balcony overlooking the ocean.

description: The 'D' Sands Condominium Motel is an Oceanfront motel with Suites and Studio Suites, located in the heart of Lincoln City. All rooms are Oceanfront and have full-sized equipped kitchens. Some rooms also come with gas-lit fireplaces. We also have an indoor heated pool and spa.
